alert.note: Alert for Pope (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:58AM CDT until April 05 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL CONWAY AND SOUTHEASTERN POPE COUNTIES... At 158 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Atkins, or 12 miles east of Russellville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Atkins... Pottsville... Hattieville... Happy Bend... Economy... Blackwell... Caglesville... Moreland... Oak Grove in Pope County... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
